summary.span: 命名空间提供 SQL Server 中本机数据类型的类。

span.span: The namespace provides classes for native data types in SQL Server.

summary.span: 这些类提供一种比 .NET Framework 公共语言运行时 (CLR) 提供的数据类型更安全、更快的替代方案。

span.span: These classes provide a safer, faster alternative to the data types provided by the .NET Framework common language runtime (CLR).

summary.span: 使用此命名空间中的类有助于防止出现精度损失造成的类型转换错误。

span.span: Using the classes in this namespace helps prevent type conversion errors caused by loss of precision.

summary.span: 由于其他数据类型在幕后与 SqlTypes 进行相互转换，所以在此命名空间内显式创建和使用对象也会使代码更快。

span.span: Because other data types are converted to and from **SqlTypes** behind the scenes, explicitly creating and using objects within this namespace also yields faster code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **SqlTypes**中的每个数据类型在 SQL Server 中具有等效的数据类型，并且具有相同的基础数据表示形式。Each data type in **SqlTypes** has its equivalent data type in SQL Server, with the same underlying data representation. 其中的许多数据类型在 CLR 中也具有等效的数据类型。Many of them also have equivalent data types in the CLR. 但是， **SqlDateTime**、 **SqlDecimal**和**SqlString**具有不同的基础数据结构及其相应的 .NET Framework 数据类型。However, **SqlDateTime**, **SqlDecimal**, and **SqlString** have different underlying data structures with their corresponding .NET Framework data types. 下表将**SqlTypes**命名空间的成员映射到 Microsoft SQL Server 的数据类型和枚举的成员。The following table maps the members of the **SqlTypes** namespace to Microsoft SQL Server data types and to the members of the enumeration. |.NET Framework SqlTypes.NET Framework SqlTypes|本机 SQL ServerNative SQL Server|.NET Framework SqlDbType.NET Framework SqlDbType| |-----------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------| ||binary、image、timestamp、varbinarybinary, image, timestamp, varbinary|Binary、Image、TimeStamp、VarBinaryBinary, Image, TimeStamp, VarBinary| ||位bit|位Bit| ||tinyinttinyint|TinyIntTinyInt| ||binary、image、timestamp、varbinarybinary, image, timestamp, varbinary|Binary、Image、TimeStamp、VarBinaryBinary, Image, TimeStamp, VarBinary| ||char、nchar、text、ntext、nvarchar、varcharchar, nchar, text, ntext, nvarchar, varchar|Char、NChar、Text、Ntext、NVarChar、VarCharChar, NChar, Text, Ntext, NVarChar, VarChar| ||datetime、smalldatetimedatetime, smalldatetime|DateTime、SmallDateTimeDateTime, SmallDateTime| ||numeric、decimalnumeric, decimal|十进制Decimal| ||floatfloat|FloatFloat| ||varbinaryvarbinary|VarBinaryVarBinary| ||uniqueidentifieruniqueidentifier|UniqueIdentifierUniqueIdentifier| ||smallintsmallint|SmallIntSmallInt| ||intint|IntInt| ||bigintbigint|BigIntBigInt| ||money、smallmoneymoney, smallmoney|Money、SmallMoneyMoney, SmallMoney| ||实数real|RealReal| ||char、nchar、text、ntext、nvarchar、varcharchar, nchar, text, ntext, nvarchar, varchar|Char、NChar、Text、Ntext、NVarChar、VarCharChar, NChar, Text, Ntext, NVarChar, VarChar| ||xmlxml|XmlXml|

span.span: SQL Server Data Types and ADO.NET
